...Oh, God. If it doesn't take machinery to get pregnant by a man, then...it can be accidental? The poor child...!
Is that--its true form? For someone who won't discuss your powers, you're certainly happy to demonstrate them--!
...All at once? So it couldn't be separated! Why are you demonstrating its mechanics but won't explain its origin?
...So, women's writing was invented by your home nation. Would you say they have more power than men in Japanese society?
That is peculiar...if only I had a more robust knowledge of Earth's history. If your nation developed the writing system that came to define women, do they dominate your society?
Stir-fry isn't too objectionable--but who's "the Human"? If they're your trainer, then why are you snacking against their advice?
...Does "the Human" know you're here, eating snack food? I can only assume they're your trainer, and that you frequently lie to them.
I was always the "sporty" girl when I was young, playing outside and getting dirty. Computer games just aren't something I'm used to...
...I don't really have the time to try them now. Even when I was a girl, they weren't a part of my life--I would play outside, running around and fighting, being "Oma"-like.
Even if I'd played those sorts of games growing up, I wouldn't have the time for them now. The girls in engineering might enjoy them more.
They just weren't something "sporty girls" played on Mejare. It's irrelevant now-- my work keeps me too busy to try them.
I see. I was more outgoing myself as a young girl--can you remember some kind of trauma when you started school that might have caused it?
That might be related to trauma around that time. I was outspoken as a girl, but I stopped speaking for a while after an accident--I went through another loud phase after that, even.
...I haven't always been quiet myself. I've had several phases of being brash or reserved--did something happen to you when you entered school?
Your...aura? That sounds like an incredible power, but you spoke like it was unreliable.
You--have an energy field that protects your body? At least, it sometimes does...I imagine huntresses overrely on it.
...Are you saying this aura breaks down from overuse? It sounds like an amazing power, but I could see how it might lead to complacency.
That's dangerous!
I would never tolerate this kind of negligence!
Are you trying to get us killed?
What's wrong with you?
Firearms aren't toys!
...Secret? What secret?
If your "secret" is breasts, I should remind you all women have them. Even some men do.
Breasts are no secret. Well, maybe on Tarak.
What do you mean that counts as two? I wear a bodysuit, and it's clearly one piece.
Counting it twice...what a cowardly move. You won't see me doing that with my suit.
You're counting the suit twice? ...Rest assured, I'll count mine as one. Nothing else would feel right to me.
Taking just the top of the suit off is cowardly. I won't be doing the same, even if it's allowed.
...I see you have a charming personality to match your skin tone. It's true we've never met alien life...but Earth has a history of twisted experiments.
...An alien...I have my doubts. Earth has never discovered alien life in its centuries of colonization...
..."Alien"? No human has encountered alien life, despite all our space exploration...you look like a modified woman.
...I'll be sure not to show concern for you in the future. Are you really a form of alien life?
...What did you call yourself? Mejare sees men as aliens, but honest alien life...right here? I assumed you were an Earth cyborg...
Underneath...your shirt? But why?
If I could undo my bra underneath my flightsuit, I wouldn't have to pirate for a living.
I consider strategy my strong suit...but I can't fathom what your endgame is here.
You can't be serious. How cowardly can you get?
Take your losses with dignity. Nothing's more embarrassing than a woman who can't own up to her failures.
Wearing makeup at all is already beyond me. To try to count it as an item is outright embarrassing...
Jura wears a lot of makeup, too...I hope she wouldn't try to count it as clothing.
Are you really that ashamed of your body? Or just of losing?
Don't waste everyone's time...have some respect for yourself.
You're a..."princess"? ...And for some reason this required disguising.
Is a "princess" some kind of leadership position? Is that why you wore an unconvincing disguise?
If you're a "princess" so desperate to remain disguised, then why did you show your face and play strip poker?
That was a disguise? I'm not interested in your politics.
Do you really need a trick to take off your clothes?
...I really wish you didn't treat this game as a magic showcase.
I'd appreciate it if you didn't waste time with parlor tricks.
I'm here for a brief game of wits, not magic tricks and lengthy showmanship.
If you think you're scaring me, I have to pilot against Earth's organ harvest fleet again tomorrow.
I'm sure you're very intimidating, Juri, but I deal with fleets of organ-harvesting robots for a living.
Street thugs don't impress me. I used to be one...and Earth's fleet of organ harvesters is a lot scarier.
During my days on the streets, I might've found you intimidating. Today I fear the organ harvesters Earth sends our way.
...What? You're saying complete nonsense. And are you really taking your shirt off already?
...Excuse me, Kizuna, I'm speaking to you. What's this gibberish about writing--and why are you starting with your shirt?
...Your choice of first strip is as nonsensical as whatever you're saying.
...Well, you certainly can start with your shirt. But what are you talking about, with "lines" and "writing"?
Isn't there any way to keep the blue one around? She at least has social skills.
At least you aren't waving a gun around this time...but your mouth is still just as filthy.
Fortunately, your split personality seems to keep you in check better than most maniacs.
Hello, Launch. For the third time now.
Wha--what's happening to you?
...Ladybug?
Ladybug, you're...glowing.
Wha--Ladybug? Are you alright?
What's wrong? Is there something you're hiding?
...You seem a little uncomfortable to be taking that off. Besides the obvious reasons why.
...Misato? Are you alright? You're looking all flushed.
Already? If you're trying to throw us off, a bodysuit would've done that without a strange strip order.
...I suppose no rule mandates a stripping order. I hope my suit isn't making you jealous with how it shows my figure.
...Well, you're backing up your attitude. Is Mejarian fashion making you feel threatened?
...I hope my slight layering isn't making you feel threatened. There's no need to throw all your clothes off.
...So much for that comparison. Now you're taking the light away?
...Just when I compare her to the Paksis, she dispels it.
...Well, perhaps we'll see what you look like now. I can't say I found the Paksis attractive.
...Hm. You looking like the Paksis reminded me of home...but I suppose this is more erotic.
I'm on a strange planet, and you want me to accept food? I'm not coming back to the ship with pink skin.
Judging by your skin color, you're eating far too many cupcakes. I'll pass...
Whatever's in your cupcakes, I don't want any. Bright pink skin can't be healthy, even if sugar were.
A cupcake? Fattening...from a foreign woman...might turn my skin pink. That's a lot of reasons to decline.
...Am I supposed to know this song?
Nothing about being a pirate is free, I promise you.
...Catchy.
All these shots and damage reports...it's like I never left the ship.
I certainly didn't picture a living ship taking damage today...it's as if I'm right back to work.
I can practically hear Belvedere's voice in my head, reporting this sort of damage to the Nirvana...
Every time you call out structural damage, instinct makes me want to rush to our hangar.
...Of course, being able to float would make it a lot easier for me to get out of mine.
I hope you realize how lucky you are to be blessed with these powers. I can't slip out of my suit so easily.

state.text: On the plus side, my suit zips in the front...but I think your levitation powers make it easier for you overall.
I suppose floating makes removing your suit much easier than it is for me. Still, it can't be fun wrestling with a zipper in the back.

case.state: Already? Well...I suppose all clothes are equal here.
For such a conservatively dressed woman, you're having a lot of fun with this.
Well, that didn't take long. I should have expected someone would strip like this.
That was fast. Is that modest look just a front?
Can't say I'm surprised. How many costumes can that thing give you?
How many costumes are available to you with that thing, anyway?
So if I rolled that die, would my outfit change? How many do you have?
It's sad how this doesn't even perturb me anymore.
I can't believe I've gotten used to this in the short time I've known you.
This really is spectacular. But couldn't you put it to better use than changing your clothes?
Since when does a bodysuit count as two pieces? Must be a media woman's need to keep the audience around.
Just keeping your viewers occupied? Because I clearly set a precedent for taking bodysuits off in one go.
Why are you counting your suit twice when I didn't? ...Trying to keep viewer interest, probably.
I suppose a reporter has to make viewers wait as long as possible. I didn't count the suit twice, after all...
Fascinating...even Mejare hasn't progressed from designer hair colors to skin.
I was only concerned for your health. I trust that you're fine, but manipulating skin colors like yours is beyond even Mejare's genetic engineering.
I see...did your parents have blue skin, as well? My homeworld can create blue hair, as you can see, but skin is out of our reach...
If you say you're healthy, then I believe you. Still...between blue skin and rainbow hair, Earth's genetic feats are far beyond Mejare's.
Agh! This power output...it's what I'd expect from the Paksis! What's happening to your body?
Ngh! It's--as if she's been enveloped by her own personal Paksis core! The energy it's giving off--!
Agh! Is this--the power held in that living uniform? It's massive--and her body is bonding with it!
"Animates"...is that your class of robot? There's only one recorded instance of a sentient robot on Mejare, and it was after one of our navigation units encountered the ship's Paksis core.
...So there's a whole production line of sentient machines like you. It took an accident with our energy core to spark emotions in one of our navigation robots.
Our crew actually has a navigation robot that's gained sentience--Pyoro, a unit that fell into our Paksis core. But it's not something we can reproduce.
Oh, that's--not necessary. Is there somewhere you can sit down...?
Oh--don't take off your prosthetics just for a game. You shouldn't have to be uncomfortable as you play.
Oh, are you...? You're already nude--there's no need to go further.
...Even now, what you're wearing would probably be a style on my homeworld.
She's nearly out, Jura...what do you think of ~name~?
If you want advice on how to take care of all that skin, we've encountered a planet called Melanus whose residents are known for it.
So...would a man prefer a sort of striptease like this? With their enormous hands, I'd expect them to just pull our clothes off themselves.
...I may have a changing relationship with men, but that doesn't mean I've forgotten women's beauty. I won't judge you.
...I may have more to lose, ~name~, but my figure is on display, just like yours.
I hate to see a woman pushed to the brink...
I'm not sure what mentality men have imposed on you here, but women need to be strong, ~name~...don't give up.
...This can't just be bad luck. I'd hate to see what our quartermaster would do to you...
There's something so different about watching you strip compared to my crewmates...perhaps because I'm making you, or because I'm clothed myself...
If you were one of my pilots, I might feel an urge to strip in solidarity...
I might feel some attraction to you, but standing here fully clothed...it's just awkward.
...Even now, what you're wearing would probably be a style on my homeworld.
I wonder how Jura is making the most of that dress she wears...it already shows a lot of skin.
If you want advice on how to take care of all that skin, we've encountered a planet called Melanus whose residents are known for it.
So...would a man prefer a sort of striptease like this? With their enormous hands, I'd expect them to just pull our clothes off themselves.
...I may have a changing relationship with men, but that doesn't mean I've forgotten women's beauty. I won't judge you.
...I may have more to lose, ~name~, but my figure is on display, just like yours.
You wouldn't last five minutes against our quartermaster at this rate. She's a notorious poker shark.
...I was expecting something smaller. Earth women's outfits seem more complex.
It's good to see bigger items coming off. I'm effectively naked myself.
I wonder if you're fit enough to handle piloting a Dread fighter...
The more I see of your body, the more I can tell whether you would fit one of our flightsuits...
Exercise isn't overly popular among Mejare's civilians. Perhaps living among men encourages Earth women to stay fit.
That's not the kind of thing that encourages small talk...
That leaves me safe in the knowledge that I'm in the lead, at least while my suit is on.
This should give me a better sense of your physical fitness. That's a top priority for pilot candidates.
Maybe it's Mejarian fashion sense, but I've always been more interested in the body underneath the clothes...
...I guess we're just about even. That's how I hoped this game would play out.
I see....it looks like things are heating up.
Inspecting men's bodies has given me a new perspective on women's...we store fat in so many more areas.
...This planet's women seem more conservative than Mejare's. Standing in your underwear is nothing to be ashamed of.
I figured as much...we have little to hide now.
There wasn't much to guess about my outfit, and now it looks like you're in the same situation...
...Don't make a fuss about showing us your underwear. You can see the state I'm in.
I'll always take function over comfort with my underwear, considering how rarely it's supposed to be seen. What about you?
...Are you out of smaller things? I wouldn't have minded more casual conversation...surprisingly.
I wonder if your ~clothing~ would look good on me. I haven't worn street clothes in a long time.
Maybe I'd make more effort to steal more clothes like yours if the scramble order couldn't come at any moment. The only other thing I wear is the chemise I sleep in.
I know most women on my homeworld would wear panties or thongs compared to these gym shorts. Have men influenced your styles at all?
Nothing really feels sufficient when I'm stuck naked...
A lot of our recruits are girls who used to be wealthy. Even stripping to their underwear around strangers is scandalous to them at first.
...I hope the captain is alright. She's been having heart issues...B.C. would probably take her place if something happened.
It's strange. Showing one's bra or panties would still be intimate on my homeworld, even though girls walk around in leotards with their backsides hanging out.
...I guess I got absorbed in my own nudity a bit--that's nothing small.
...What's the time? I usually check it on the watch in my suit...
...Does me being like this make stripping easier for you?
Take my mind off of piloting...
Maybe I did need to cut loose.
This is so exciting...I see the same women every day.
You have a great body. Mejarians are always comparing.
I'm starting to feel a little glad you made me masturbate...
An excellent choice...for an excellent opponent.
What else are you hiding? If only I could force you to show it myself...
Why didn't we all start with the same amount of clothes?
You're full of surprises, ~name~. It's a good trait in a woman.
I don't mind a little skin. Not at this point, anyway...nothing to lose.
(Go ahead...imagine your life together with this girl. That's what fantasies are for...)
(Don't be ashamed of the feelings you have for her...you deserve love.)
(I just think you should get a girlfriend...there's plenty of willing girls on our crew, you know.)
~name~...I-I hope this isn't strange to you...woman embracing like this.
(Ooh, she really is cute! Go ask her out, Meia...she's seen your most private side already, anyway.)
..."Hate-fuck." Don't be ridiculous...blue hair is not enough to woo me.
Be quiet. No amount of sideline jeering is going to make a drunken soldier appealing to me.
...If you're trying to pair me with Sei because I have blue hair, Futaba, you two share a height.
...Yes, a "hate-fuck" would be the only way I'd ever find myself in bed with Sei. But don't count on it.
You...seem a little hostile towards men. You didn't grow up on Mejare, did you?
Seems Mejarian relationships have a home on Earth, too...because you certainly aren't fond of men.
Take it easy, would you? Men aren't total monsters.
Your hatred of men puts Mejarians to shame. What did one do to you early in life?
So...you two are an item, I assume? And that's why you're defensive around men?
You...seem a little hostile towards men. Mejarian soldiers would certainly like robotic arms.
Seems Mejarian relationships have a home on Earth, too...because you certainly aren't fond of men. Is that how you lost your arm?
Take it easy, would you? Men aren't total monsters. I think they'd be afraid of your arm.
Your hatred of men puts Mejarians to shame. Did a man cut off your arm?
So...you two are an item, I assume? And that's why you're defensive around men...aside from losing your arm?
...Should we just leave you two alone? You seem to forming a romance as we speak.
...I didn't expect to see womanly love blooming here, but maybe I should have...what with the stripping.
You two...seem to be getting along. Good to see a familiar Mejarian relationship on this strange planet.
And I thought Earth women exclusively liked men. You two are quickly becoming more than friends.
And the rambling drunkard claims I'm the agitator.
...You want to handle this girl, Jura? I think you two would get along better.
Can you take over this conversation, Jura? I'm sure you and Sei can find new ways to make fun of me.
I'd be happy to leave you alone. If only you'd do the same.
There's nothing to worry about, Marinette. I won't start a fight... and Sei is too inebriated to win one.
We don't need to be separated. Sei isn't much of a threat anymore--and I don't plan on provoking her.
Don't worry, Marinette. Even if Sei thinks about arresting me, she'll just trip over herself and fall asleep.
Earlier I might have been concerned about Sei's equipment, but now she can barely see straight. A fight won't take long, Marinette.
...I'm sorry you had to be subjected to this, Rin. But every girl who's cast aside eventually learns the truth about authority.
...Take this night as a warning, Rin--the state does not have your interests in mind.
Rin. The next time your planet's military claims to protect you, remember this image of a drunken imp.
...Always have respect for yourself, Rin, no matter what happens. Sei has all of her limbs, and she just abuses her authority.
You're drinking so much...don't you have to work tomorrow?
I can't be drinking like you...I don't get days off.
You don't have the height to be knocking all those drinks back.
Alcohol...empty calories.
Compared to this girl, Jura, you're downright temperate. Sorry I said anything.
Well, Jura, she's certainly giving you a comprehensive look into alien women's fashion.
Well, you're certainly keeping us on our toes.
Hm? Actual progress? Maybe I misjudged you...what do you think, Jura?
...This is the last time I try to make small talk about an Earth woman's interests.
And Jura wonders why I don't bother talking to people...
...At least you're passionate about it.
What's "1983"? I have no context for Earth years, Chiaki.
...Would you like it if I started rattling off my Dread's specifications?
Ah, yes. The enn-ee-ess. That explains everything. Thanks, Chiaki.
...Nayru? Are you alright? Blink if you can understand me.
...It stopped. Nayru, can you hear me? Say something.
...Nayru? Hello? You might just be feeling shock--try to relax.
...Are you alright, Nayru? It might've just torn your dress...try to speak, if it doesn't hurt.
...You must enjoy your work. I can't imagine taking sexuality so lightly....
...This is hardly my idea of fun. To watch women strip nude every day so... casually...
...I would need an ulterior motive to be here...like studying Earth culture. Conflating sex and fun seems unwise...
Mixing fun and work seems ill-advised...but perhaps that's the perspective of a fighter pilot. Sex seems so casual to you...
Tell me something I don't know. So they're just as mystifying to women who live around them every day...
...You've lived around men your entire life, and you don't understand how they think, either? Unbelievable...
...Mejare would have you believe men don't feel anything at all. It's not encouraging to hear that Earth women struggle with them, too.
I don't have time to observe men all day and figure them out. I was hoping Earth women understood them better...
"Exciting"? Well...our prisoners certainly brought some intrigue of their own on board. And some--intimate cockpit seating.
"Exciting"...to a certain kind of woman, maybe. They have helped us unlock new power--provided I sit up against one of them.
I suppose there's a certain "excitement" when joining my ship with a man's...for the power gained, not our--seating arrangement.
I have crewmates who find men's presence on our ship far more exciting than I do. Even when I co-pilot with one, it's...strange.
Their bodies? Well...some are certainly taller than others. But they're nothing like women...
Women's bodies are "nice." Men's are much broader, harsher...utilitarian. No matter the size...
...Well, men's bodies certainly aren't graceful like women's. They're built to destroy, or do heavy lifting.
I...suppose so. But next to women, men are so...angular. More suited for crushing rocks than caressing someone.
Comforting? Men's strength is the first thing Mejarians are warned about as girls. "Never let them catch you."
Therein lies the difference between Earth and Mejare. You see men's strength as a partner's protection--we see it as an enemy's weapon.
...Maybe if I trusted a man enough, that imposing strength would be a comfort. We were all spun stories about how they'd restrain us...
..."Comforting." Even as pirates, we're warned to never engage in hand-to-hand combat with men if we can help it. They're such burly animals...
I suppose that's true...I've learned men aren't all the same beast. Some are shorter, some serious...some cowards.
...You're right. As a girl, I was taught men were all the same beastly, hulking monster. But some are actually intelligent...or handsome.
...I was hoping for general advice, but perhaps men are just as complex as women...each one requires a different approach.
Surely there's general characteristics men share. I was always taught that there was nothing that made them different from each other.

I appreciate it.
...Out of curiosity, how many of your videos fit what I requested?
...You didn't consider that for long. Just how many of your videos feature you...taking a man's seed?
...That's the subject of most of your work in the first place, isn't it? How many videos have you and a man starred in?
...That was a rather paltry request, wasn't it? How much of your work features a man penetrating you?
..."Birth control"? So Earth women use some sort of device to prevent pregnancy... that can't be flattering for the man.
"Birth control"? Oh, I see...you have a means of blocking men's seed. Still, that must put an air of mistrust over things...
...So, not only does sex with a man have a looming threat of unplanned pregnancy, but you can employ "birth control" and show you don't trust him.
...I see. I can't imagine there's much of an emotional bond with a man when you're desperately blocking his attempts to impregnate you.
Sex and pregnancy...that connection just doesn't exist on Mejare. And what kind of message does "birth control" send to your partner?
...A "Kamui," you called it? Unbelievable...it is alive. Perhaps the more potent an energy source, the more it approximates a life form...
A "Kamui"...between this and the Paksis core, perhaps mimicing the energy of human emotions is what creates powerful weapons.
Amazing...you must wield incredible destructive power with that uniform. I don't know how it compares to a standard Dread, however...
My God...that's far beyond our own personal weaponry. Still, I wonder if this Earth super-uniform is stronger and more efficient than Dreads...
Unbelievable...Earth is developing super soldiers that combine with their living clothing. A Dread should be more powerful, however...
I see. Fama women are expected to support Oma women on Mejare as the homemaker in a couple. But that's a choice--it's strange to assume all women are demure.
...Homemakers. That sounds a lot like the support roles Fama women fall into for their Oma partners on my world--I guess the tradition had to come from somewhere.
That kind of uncertainty about yourself is exactly why you seem so human. Pyoro has those insecurities, too--I told him the same thing.
...Pyoro has told me he's not sure if he's really sentient, either. Having those kinds of doubts seems pretty human to me.
There are computer games that require you to be active? Maybe something like our flight simulations that give physical feedback...
I thought computer games were played at a desk. Unless you would include our flight simulations as games, where the normal stresses of piloting are applied to one's body.
I apologize. Maybe I could ask Parfet about them...given the chance, what games would you have shown me?
Parfet might know what could run on our simulation computers...in any case, thank you for the offer. Which games would be your examples?
...So, it may be because the other children didn't know how to react to you. I think I would've been one of them at your school...I was a loudmouth who liked to play games.
...I see. Social trauma is still trauma. And those other girls were still just children, unable to understand another's shyness...like I would've been at that age.
...So, you were shy, and the girls at your school dismissed you as strange. I used to treat the "weird girls" like that, too, when they didn't want to play with me.
You could've killed someone!
Barnette's a gun nut, too...but she has the sense to go to the firing range.
Men's kinetic weapons are so uncivilized.
I hope you're proud of your reckless disregard for safety.
Danger is not something you joke about!
Sweater...puppies? Earthlings and their vulgar sex slang...
Well. Look what you were hiding away,
...Oh. They're larger than they look. Great.
Well, my theory's confirmed...they're bigger than mine.
...I should've expected this. The suit made it obvious...
...Your suit was very form-fitting.
A revealing suit...a bigger bust.
...I actually own a swimsuit like that. Gascogne gave it to me.
...I actually own a swimsuit like that. But we all use the hot springs naked anyway.
I actually own a swimsuit like that. But mine isn't covered in blood.
Bloodstains...menstrual issues, or just a murderer?
...I'm sure your syringe-arm is also in perfect condition, and that you'd mock me for acknowledging it.
At least now I know not to ask about your mechanical arm, since you'll just interpret it as an insult and retort.
I was going to ask about your mechanical syringe-arm next, but now I know you'll just insult me again.
I was actually curious about the syringe-arm you have, but it seems you're not here to engage with anyone.
...For a second there, I was about to lose all respect for you.
...Well, that's more acceptable. I don't know why you'd play this game if you found stripping so disagreeable.
You shouldn't have made such a fuss in the first place. It's just a game.
See? No reason to hide your face. You look fine.
Why were you hiding your face in the first place? Are you some kind of outlaw?
Celtic hid her whole body for a while...because she was afraid of men's germs. Why were you doing it?
The shirt, too? The least you could do is practice before forcing us to watch you.
...Was the shirt supposed to come off, too? Was that a subtle apology for wasting time?
I thought you were just doing the vest. How hard could that have been?
...If losing the shirt was a mistake, keep making mistakes. It's more entertaining than whatever you had planned.
...You were keeping food in your pants? That's unsanitary...and wasteful, which is even worse.
Am I supposed to find rotting food amusing? Meals aren't a given in my line of work.
...It seems Earthlings have the luxury of wasting food on parlor tricks.
Bananas are a rarity on Mejare...food in general is, actually. We're lucky to have stolen enough to create a reserve stock.
You're a..."superhero"? I don't follow...
You looked like you were made of Paksis energy for a second there...you're a "superhero"?
...I'm sorry, you're a "superhero"?
I've heard of ladybugs...but Mejare doesn't have any. "Superheroes" I'm not sure about...
Mejare doesn't have any ladybugs...neither does Earth anymore, in all likelihood. And what does a "superhero" do?
Oh, God. I--didn't realize.
Oh...I'm sorry.
I'm lucky. I've been in a lot of battles, but suffered no permanent injuries.
I guess I shouldn't have brought up the Second Impact...that was rude of me. I'm sorry.
I almost died in a battle once...a piece of the Paksis got lodged in my head.
If your goal is to lose, why are you even playing?
Just trying to expose herself...this girl is wasting my time and hers.
...If you're only interested in throwing the game, you can strip on the street corner.
I'm assuming your shorts are next? I don't appreciate someone throwing the game and wasting my time.
So you do resemble a woman. Is that what women of Planet Hyrule look like?
...So are you a typical resident of Planet Hyrule? You resemble a woman, but you're much smaller...
...You claimed earlier to be from a "Hyrule" planet. I assume you're an average woman from there?
...It would seem the typical woman of Planet Hyrule does not grow very large. At least you can fly.
You didn't have to be ashamed of your face.
Why hide your face? You look perfectly fine.
I didn't know Earth women had skin colors like that...
Someone's not shy about pubic hair...I find it distasteful, but it's your choice.
We can already see your pubic hair...why you'd want any at all is beyond me.
Pubic hair must be popular on Earth...and some of my crewmates don't have the diligence to stay shaven.
The rambling drunkard claims I'm the agitator...
You really would get along with Jura...especially if your sexual comments are anything to go by.
You and Jura would have a great time thinking up new ways to make fun of me.
I'd be happy to leave you alone. If only you'd do the same.
You're drinking so much...don't you have to work tomorrow?
I can't be drinking like you...I don't get days off.
You don't have the height to be knocking all those drinks back.
Alcohol...empty calories.
Compared to you, Jura's downright temperate.
My bodysuit is tight enough...I'd never wear that underneath it.

(Are you still jealous, Meia? I think you're on the higher end on this planet...)
(Well, check out this cutie! I hope I'm not making you masturbate to a little kid.)
(Hm. Earth girls don't exactly impress...not like we do. Imagine feeding your daughters...)
I...no woman on Mejare is that flat. I'd feel bad, but this is like culture shock...
I think...Misty is about as flat. But she's fourteen, and from Pluto...your size is unheard of on Mejare.
...I'm too self-conscious about my size, clearly. Mejarians must be unusually well-endowed...
I thought Misty was an outlier, but looking at you...Earth women's breasts don't get very big, do they? Mejare is the outlier.
Uh...alright then. I guess you listened.
You didn't know the die could do that?
So you could have lost far before this if you were unlucky?
...Those are cute, ~name~. You shouldn't feel self-conscious about them.
...One of our bridge operators, Celtic, has a nearly flat chest like yours. I'd like to think we don't tease her as much as civilians would.
...You shouldn't be ashamed of what you can't control.
...What do you think, Jura? Is she "sweating them away" like I do?
Hmm. Those are like a child's breasts...you're not a child, right?
...Maybe it was rude of me to worry about my own so much.
...Those are cute, ~name~.
...Women can't do much to hide their bust size. You could pad your bra, I suppose...or your flight armor.
Our ship's hot springs are thought to boost female hormone output and encourage breast growth...we should have the water analyzed.
...I've read that daily massages can help your breasts grow. Preferably done by another...
...Are you getting proper nutrition, ~name~?
...That's nothing to be self-conscious about, ~name~. This armor might hide it, but my breasts are modest, too...
Oh...you may simply have not hit your growth spurt yet, ~name~. I have a young Plutonian crewmate who's quite flat.
To some extent, Mejarian babies undergo gene therapy for this...my sixteen-year-old trainee has large breasts.
...Hm. Mine don't impress, either...it's one benefit of this padded armor.
...I'm sorry, ~name~. I sometimes get playful jabs about mine from crewmates--I'm known for having bigger breasts than Paiway. Our child nurse.
...Oh. Among other things, Mejare is known for the large busts of its women. Do Earth women value the same thing?
...It's nothing to be ashamed of. I've read breast size has little to do with milk production, and it certainly doesn't help in combat.
...Breasts aren't what make a woman, ~name~. It isn't your fault.
...Is your bustline common among Earth women, ~name~? I wonder if this planet harvests breasts from Mejare, as well.
...Any Mejarian with small breasts is likely to get picked on at some point or another. Is that true on Earth, as well?
Do modest breasts run in your family, ~name~? I may have inherited my Oma's bustline.
...Would you say Earth has a large proportion of women with flat chests? It might be from a lack of any gene selection...
...I'm sorry, ~name~. My own breasts are modest, too--78 centimeters at last measure.
...I didn't realize at first that men all had flat chests. I wonder if some feel a kinship with flat women for that reason.
...Well, excess fat is impractical for combat. I like to take comfort in that myself.
...You're rather small, even by my usual standards. One of our bridge operators has a chest like yours.
...Those are cute, ~name~. You shouldn't feel self-conscious about them.
...One of our bridge operators, Celtic, has a nearly flat chest like yours. I'd like to think we don't tease her as much as civilians would.
...You shouldn't be ashamed of what you can't control.
...Have you been spending too much time in the spa? My second-in-command says I sweat mine away.
Hmm. Those are like a child's breasts...you're not a child, right?
...Maybe it was rude of me to worry about my own so much.
...You're not teased for those, are you? They're actually kind of cute.
...I'm sorry. Most women on Mejare aren't quite that small, just because of mild gene therapy and hormones in our food.
...It's our imperfections that make humans interesting, don't you think? And in the end, having smaller breasts is a pretty mild flaw.
Yours look a lot like Misty's, a refugee girl we took in. Hers have barely sprouted, even though she's a teenager. Pluto and Earth must lack any widespread hormone supplements.
...It's actually somewhat of an embarrassment for a Mejarian couple if their daughter grows to be flat-chested. Some don't mind--my Oma was very plain herself, for instance.
...I'm not used to being bigger than other girls.
...I rank fairly low on our crew's chest size measurements myself. Not at the bottom, but you don't get anywhere by making flattering comparisons.
Do you work in any kind of combat role, ~name~? Having less excess fat on your chest actually makes you better-suited for that.
The mild hormone supplements in our diet would probably help your breasts grow, ~name~. Of course, I now realize they're put there to fatten us up for harvesting.
...Being flat-chested doesn't make you any less of a woman, ~name~. As long as you hold your head high and take pride in your appearance.
...Oh, those are smaller than I realized. Mine have shrunk somewhat from doing cardio--is that your situation, or are they at their natural size?
...This is why I call myself modest instead of small. I'd be fishing for compliments with you next to me.
...Size isn't everything with breasts. It keeps your figure slender, but they're still sensitive. It's cute.
...Maybe I'm too sensitive about my chest. I'd fare better if I let them grow, but I have to burn fat.
I've noticed the girl we took in from Pluto has a flat chest like yours. Smaller breasts might be more common in women's genetics as one gets closer to Earth.
...It isn't much benefit, but smaller breasts make you look younger. I'm assuming that's a compliment on Earth, too.
Even on Mejare, where breasts are a cultural symbol, girls with small breasts still find partners. My Oma was one...are there men who prefer flat chests?
...I wouldn't be surprised if men preferred girls with flat chests. You'd look more alike.
...As I like to say, excess fat just gets in the way of combat. Maybe that's small comfort to a civilian girl, but it still makes exercise easier.
...Some might say otherwise, but small breasts don't make you any less of a woman. It's actually kind of cute.
...I hope you don't feel bad about those, ~name~. You can still massage them, shake them, nurse from them--they're still breasts.
You're still gorgeous, ~name~...breasts aren't what define a woman.
Like Misty's...agh, I shouldn't be thinking like that.
You have the heart of a good Fama, if not the chest.
You're still cute. You're not embarrassed, are you?
Best to just accept your flaws...I'm still working on that.
Cute little things. Are you still a child?
I wonder if Earth food is short on hormones...
Right up there with Misty. I guess it gets cold on Pluto...
It's not the size of the ship...it's the grace in space.
Puts my size anxiety into perspective...
Maybe Mejarians are uncommonly endowed...
...Wow. I always fret over my size, but...I have nothing to complain about, it seems.
(Such a cutie. Imagine having an Earth girlfriend...or Pluto, if you'd rather Misty.)
(Hey, ~name~, what do you think of Meia's chest? She's a little self-conscious...)
(Picture yourself with her...living peacefully on Mejare...raising your daughters together...)
A-ah...agh...~name~, they're--!
I--I don't want to stare...I don't know how Earth women feel about that...
"Sei sandwich"...how can one woman be so vulgar? And just as I was warming up to you...
Tch...no matter how fit a woman is, I have a hard time respecting her when she comes on to children.
...Do you have to be so forward? I was starting to appreciate your body, and then you want to sandwich us...
...You only had a tenuous grasp on my interest, Sei. Dial back the flirting...and don't make it a threesome.
I'd be surprised if a drunken soldier was actually elected in the first place, Gwen.
What kind of utopia is this "New York" planet if even its soldiers are elected officials? I doubt Sei has any concern for that.
Aren't you used to soldiers' hypocrisy where you're from, Gwen? I'm surprised you think they're elected.
What voters? Sei is a soldier, Gwen...and she's having a hard enough time winning me over.
At least pretend to care you're losing. Do men really have this effect on women?
What good is sex if you'd do it with just anyone? This must be men's influence.
I take back anything I've said about you being flirtatious, Jura. Maybe men's seed is a neurotoxin...
By all means, Gwen, take her off my hands. I'm afraid she might start doing what soldiers do, so to speak.
Sei seems unfortunately fixated on me, Gwen...likely because we share a hair color. It's simple enough for her to understand.
You would think her drunkenness would've found another target by now. Keep distracting her, Gwen.
By all means, Gwen. Sei's constant flirting would be complimentary...if she weren't a drunken tyrant.
There's no way you can call me boring that Jura hasn't already dreamt up...
For an Earth woman, you sure have an interest in the female body.
Funny. I thought Earth women had little interest in each other.
Maybe you'd break my stoicism if you said something interesting.
My idea of a fun time is winning a poker game, not drinking and making a fool of myself.
I see the White Knights choose their soldiers based on professionalism and poise.
Sei stopped considering what she said to me about five drinks ago. Take note of a soldier's professionalism, Marinette.
I hope this experience is teaching you about the true nature of military women, Marinette. Unprincipled, sloppy, and short.
...Marinette, you're a young woman. Remember this comparison between pirate and a soldier, and never trust authority.
You're learning what the world is really like, Marinette: sober pirates and drunken soldiers. This game is claiming your innocence in many ways.
Is there something wrong with your breasts? At least face us.
Don't tell me you lack the nerve to look us in the eye like this.
For someone so sure of her superiority, you seem rather embarrassed to look at us like this.
Don't ask me what would possess a woman to play strip poker when she's too embarrassed to face us nude.
Oh. Well, at least that moves things along.
Even you seem to be getting tired of these tricks.
That's...a pleasant turn of events. Unless you're hiding even more somewhere.
Finally. I've never enjoyed these sorts of parlor tricks.
Purple skin, and claiming to be a "pony"...I really want to believe this is all to confuse us.
Bare it all immediately to shake everyone up...could be effective.
This really is surprising. Maybe I should have figured someone would try to shake us by doing this...
Perhaps this is the best way to play...expose yourself early to avoid embarrassment later.
...I don't know much about romance. But there's a line between thinking things through and being scared to act.
I'm not so good with this sort of thing myself, but...it sounds like you've given it some thought. That's good, but you can think for so long that you never act.
...All I know about this sort of thing is that you can't force your way into someone's heart. But...at some point, you have to make your feelings known.
...I've always been too impulsive myself. But without that, I might just sit in my quarters planning formations, and never actually fly...I think you undertsand.
Is there a doctor in this place? We all know how these stunts are going to end.
You're really asking for an accident. Where's our one doctor when you need him?
I just don't understand you. And not in an interesting way.
Well...you may not be disciplined, but with your body on full display, I can say you're in excellent shape...
Mm...I love meeting women who are just as dedicated to fitness. You come together nicely.
...Well, despite your forgetfulness, you haven't forgotten to train your body. I respect women for that...
...So does your figure come from exercise, or a life of fighting? Either way, it's a pleasure to see.
M-magic? What are you--
That's--my God. You are a fairy.
Magic? You really are a fairy...though based on how you treat men, not the ones I read about as a girl.
I--you--that's incredible!
At least pretend to care you're losing. Do men really have this effect on women?
What good is sex if you'd do it with just anyone? This must be men's influence.
I take back anything I've said about Jura being flirtatious. Maybe men's seed is a neurotoxin...
There's no way you can call me boring that my pilots haven't already dreamt up.
For an Earth woman, you sure have an interest in the female body.
It's funny. I thought Earth women had little interest in each other...but alcohol tells another story.
Maybe you'd break my stoicism if you said something interesting.
My idea of a fun time is winning a poker game, not drinking and making a fool of myself.
I see the White Knights choose their soldiers based on professionalism and poise.
...And you're certainly quick to bare them. Every story I've heard about men was fearmongering about them eating our organs...
...It's hard to look past what I've always been told about them. We were spun stories of men...ganging up on women.
..."Fun". From childhood, we were told stories about men surrounding a lone woman...pinning her down...spawning tendrils.
"Fun"...men are the bigger and stronger of the two sexes. We were always taught to never let them get close, or they'd crush us...
Mm...I hate to have lost, but seeing a woman put mgh muscles on display...well, more than you already did.
Hmhmhm. Even sitting here in shame, when you make your toned stomach fully visible...I don't mind.
Agh...p-part of my forgot how toned your body was. Muscular women always do this to me...
I know you're from Earth, Jolyne...but your time in prison must have accustomed you to women staring, right? You're so fit...
I understand. I wasn't sure about becoming a pilot myself before I took the chance. But you're clearly intelligent enough--and, well, beautiful enough.
I can't make that leap for you, but I've had similar moments of doubt. All humans do. And--well, you do look very human.
Those look like they're in good condition. Our spa attendants once offered to massage mine...I'm not sure if that was part of their protocol.
...That's a perfectly healthy size that you should be proud of.
...Nothing about her is making you feel self-conscious, is it, Jura?
Mejarians are voluptuous by design, so I see many women with larger breasts than yours...for the record, I'm not one of them.
...Those are perfectly manageable. If you were to join the Nirvana's crew, a uniform would fit you just fine.
I hope those are big enough on Earth to avoid any teasing. I had to weather a few jeers about my breast size before I became an officer.
...If it isn't obvious, my armor is padded. That's for protection, but I do appreciate the look...
Do Earth men like breasts? Mejarians tend to obsess over them...
Those are quite shapely. I don't have the breasts to be a Fama, unfortunately...
...I don't mean to comment on your every body part, but those look nice, ~name~. Supple and shapely.
If you're comparing your bust size to mine, my armor may be misleading you...
There's an uncomfortable power dynamic with a fully clothed woman standing over a topless one...
...Is it considered intimate to reveal your breasts on Earth? On Mejare, they're for partners' or close friends' eyes only...men must complicate that.
Those look like they're in good condition. Our spa attendants once offered to massage mine...I'm not sure if that was part of their protocol.
...That's a perfectly healthy size that you should be proud of.
...Oh, those are nice. My top pilot has quite the impressive chest, and she knows it...her own dress has a neckline past her navel.
Mejarians are voluptuous by design, so I see many women with larger breasts than yours...for the record, I'm not one of them.
...Those are perfectly manageable. If you were to join the Nirvana's crew, a uniform would fit you just fine.
I hope those are big enough on Earth to avoid any teasing. I had to weather a few jeers about my breast size before I became an officer.
I always feel as if taking off my armor is tantamount to revealing my breasts...
...Do you know your exact measurements? As part of our crew's fitness tests, we take bust-waist-hips readings every so often.
Those look about on par with the average among my crewmates, or a bit below...I'm obsessing over size, aren't I?
...I recently read a book on human reproduction we discovered. Your breasts look a lot like those on the "example" women in its diagrams.
...I hope you're satisfied with their size. Those would be serviceable on any world, including mine.
There's been rumors on our ship that bathing in water that's contacted our energy core will boost hormone output, expanding the bustline. I wonder if that's true regardless of size...
That's a nice size. You'd make a good Fama--it's often whoever's breasts are bigger in the couple.
I can't fight for my entire life, so eventually I'd like to have a bustline more like yours. I wonder if there's a way to make them grow besides becoming pregnant.
I see this sort of thing all the time...but it's always the same women, and the same breasts.
Those look like a healthy size for any activity. Excess fat is bad for combat, but not enough makes it hard to become a Fama.
One of our bridge operators has been breastfeeding her newborn baby. Her breasts have swelled quite a bit when they used to be modest like mine.
Women's breasts must be my homeworld's most important image. There's a beautiful curvature to them, don't you think?
Big or small, each woman's breasts are unique to her. And they're so close to our eyes--they really form an important part of our identities.
...Those are nice, ~name~. Supple and full without any noticeable sag--it's a good indication of a girl's overall health.
...I guess we're comparable in more ways than just poker luck, ~name~.
...If I were picturing my time in the jacuzzi before, this is like a crewmate lowering herself in with me.
...I actually feel kind of excited looking at you. Maybe I'm just too used to my crewmates' breasts, and now you're someone new...
I've always felt I occupied a strange spot between small and medium-sized breasts. The sort of handfuls that aren't easily characterized.
...Mhm. I know I keep going on about men...but I can't just ignore my upbringing. Just look at the two of us, topless like this.
Those look like a healthy size, ~name~. You might shrink down to around my level if you did more cardio.
...Does Earth use the same cup sizes as Mejare? You look like you're somewhere in the B-to-C-cup range using our system.
You look to be about a B- or C-cup...how ironic that our commander, B.C., has D-cup breasts.
Those look fairly standard. If men release any kind of pheromones that affect women's bodies, there may be subtle differences between us in breast growth or lactation triggers.
...It almost feels like we're exposing ourselves for some third party instead of to each other, doesn't it?
...Now that we're both stuck like this, it's only fair to pay you some compliments. So...your figure comes together nicely.
...No matter how big or small, a girl needs her pride. That another reason I like to exercise, since breasts can be fleeting.
...Men still massage your breasts, at least, don't they? As partners, I mean. It builds trust to be touched like that.
Even a teenager on Mejare will usually have breasts around your size. It's strange to see our trainee Dita next to Misty, who's from Pluto and is much smaller.
Unlike with men, I don't have to question how this makes me feel. But...I do wonder if I would feel different had I been raised on Earth.
...Another girl staring at yours still feels intimate, don't you think? Even if you aren't interested, they're always covered...they're close to your heart.
I...don't have much sexual experience. At least, anything that was gentle. But breasts are so sensitive, I liked to give them attention when I could...

...Even though one of the girls on our ship knows a lot about men, she couldn't keep the attention of male pilot we had. He was more interested in a girl with bigger breasts. Does that sound typical for Earth?
If girls don't pay any romantic attention to each other here, I hope it's at least done platonically. Breast health is important.
It's so nice to see an unfamiliar woman...
~name~...massage them a little.
Well, don't just stand there. Move around.
Ah...this is what I needed. A woman's breasts...nice and familiar.
I wonder where you'd rank on our crew...
For all its faults, Mejare's government does encourage breast health.
There's no gravity in space...helps them sit higher, if you follow.
This is cathartic, following my loss...
Those would have been a good masturbation aid...
I've always considered breasts a good indicator of health.
(Try not to be jealous for once. You can feel mine, after all...just be happy she's such a wonderful size.)
(You need to stop comparing yourself so much. You've got quite the head on your shoulders, after all...)
J-Jura...oh, God, they're incredible.
(How's ~name~ for girlfriend material? She'd certainly keep your daughters well-fed.)
...She's right, I do enjoy massages. But not from drunken gremlins calling themselves soldiers.
Don't bother. A hard-drinking, foul-mouthed military woman isn't the type I want groping my chest.
She wouldn't make a good masseuse anyway. At best she'd drunkenly paw at them...if she can reach them, that is.

state.text: Save it, Jura. Even a massage from this woman wouldn't put me in a good mood...she's too vulgar.

case.state: Catria's insecurity here...puts mine into perspective, actually.
...Perhaps I shouldn't complain about how my breasts compare to yours. Not when Catria's situation is much worse.
...If you make me insecure, I can only imagine how Catria must feel. Earth women's chests seem to be smaller all around...
Seeing Catria's breasts has taught me to appreciate my own, actually.
...As expected. I've known you for too long.
See? Hardly anything, but enough to to play with...for your viewing pleasure.
Sometimes I hate being right.
At least she's wearing underwear. That I didn't take as a given.
...We both know you're better-looking, Jura. No need to patronize me...especially when the audience is a man.
...Is this your attempt at flattering me, Jura? I'm not concerned whether a man thinks I'm beautiful or not.
...Jotaro's a man, Jura. There's no need to talk up my appearance to him...
...What's your angle here? I couldn't care less whether a man thinks I'm beautiful...not that I know what men even look for.
Whatever bodily comparisons I make are against my better nature...piloting skills are a better measure of worth.
I'd tell you to keep your vanity to yourself, but I suppose that's paradoxical.
Well, there they are. Excuse me for not being thrilled...being flashed in the spa tends to desensitize you.
I'd rather compare flight performances. Barnette puts in more effort than you do...perhaps a demotion is in order.
...Oh. OK...thank God there's a shred of modesty in there somewhere.
Well, it certainly isn't much, but at least it's there.
There's no doubt in my mind you wear that all the time, and not just for this game...but at least it's something.
You could do with a bra, as well...your dress only helps so much.
I hope I feel that secure if I have a daughter of my own. My rebelling never ended--now I'm stripping naked with a woman old enough to be my mother.
I wonder if my parents thought the same thing about me. Here I am rebelling against the government--watching a woman their age take her breasts out.
At least you spoiled the surprise ahead of time.
...Why exactly are you ashamed of that?
How deceiving. Congratulations.
...Your modesty is flattering.
Hard to tell with your suit still covering them...but you seem well-endowed.
No denying it...even with the suit still on, they're big.
You can tell right through the suit how big they are...
I've always felt my suit made my breasts look more modest...yours seems to accentuate them.
...You're a cat. Not dressed as one, but...a cat. Earth is something else...
Your breasts out already...and you say you're some kind of cat-woman hybrid? Earth...
Is this what Earth's been doing with its stolen organs? Generating mutant catwomen?
Mejare has cats in zoos...but almost no animals at all. Too see a cat, and one combined with a woman...it's unreal.
Behold. The beginning and ending of Jura's identity.
Happy to see your first pair of Mejarian breasts? It'll also be the last.
I hope no one feels as if they're antagonizing Jura by making her show her breasts...quite the opposite.
There's more to life than your breasts, Jura. Try taking this seriously for a change.
At least with the leotard I can understand needing help. Especially considering the...size of your backside.
That's...a lot to handle. And you developed all that muscle? I've got a lot of respect for you...
Oh, your...backside. It's a lot...but in a good way. I can tell you worked hard to give it that volume...
All that muscle...Mejare hardly pays attention to the butt, but I like how a dedicated woman can improve hers.
...Large, full, gravity-defying breasts. I'm sure you have much to be embarrassed about.
...How fortunate that a woman who can defy gravity has the breasts to show that off.
...You're very full-figured, Ochako. I imagine gravity won't be making your breasts sag anytime soon.
...Oh. Your bra was actually holding your breasts back...much like gravity can't.
...You can fly, your breasts are bigger, and they won't sag like mine. The bodysuit only makes the comparison crueler.
What? Oh, your glasses...no, I don't see them. And I'm not stopping.
Surely you're not blind enough to not see the cards. We're going to continue.
You really flung them off like that...I guess you're not used to pulling off your sweater that way. Moving on...
I'm not stopping just because you're careless. Are you really that blind?
Parfet's not much better without her glasses...still, I'm going to keep going. You should have been more careful.
Quite the flourish. You've been waiting all night to do that, haven't you?
I don't think we'll ever see eye-to-eye on these matters, but you certainly have style.
If this bodysuit comes off, don't expect me to do it with the same kind of flair.
Well, Jura, you sure made it count. Nothing makes you happier than showing off your breasts, does it?
Sorry to say, but I don't think I'll be living up to that reveal.
Jura's breasts are shapely, as you can see. So if you're curious what Mejarians strive for, there it is.
Even with my bra on, you can see I don't quite measure up...
Well, there it is. I hope everyone enjoys the best Mejare has to offer.
...Let's move on.
...You know, Jura, trust is important among crewmates.
...You're hilarious, Jura. And I'm an idiot.
...You know, I have a reputation to uphold. People expect you to be publicly stripping.
...Very funny. Excuse me for being concerned.
I don't appreciate being lied to, Jura. I have to take threats seriously.
...Maybe it's all a game to you, but I'm responsible for my crewmates' safety...and decency.
Should've known...but it's better to be cautious.
Just go back to the game and stop trying to trick me. If you hadn't noticed, all you've got left is that tiny thong.
Can't believe you're busy trying to trick me when your only defense is a thin strip of fabric.
Stop trying to trick me and focus on deceiving your opponents.
Poker is a game all about lying, so keep it up...apparently I'm very honest.
You're one to talk, Jura. I haven't shoved his face into my cleavage.
Says the woman who asks for his seed on a weekly basis.
I'd say you're projecting your feelings towards him onto me, but you've always been quite open about them...
Me with a man? Don't count on it...they're too simple.
Figures you wouldn't recognize the difference between respect and love.
...Hm. Do Earth men prefer larger breasts, as Mejarian women do?
...You must be very proud of your chest. I don't know the feeling.
Appreciation for larger breasts is surely universal across cultures...except, perhaps, for Tarak. They'd be afraid of you suffocating them.
...What do you think, Jura? She might have you beaten...but even then, it wouldn't dent your pride, would it?
...Those are very impressive. You'd be welcome in the Nirvana's hot springs, where you'd find plenty of competition.
I'd make a comment, but I know better than to think similarly large breasts will inspire any jealousy in you, Jura. Gascogne and B.C. already rival you.
...You must be very proud of them.
Those are...if you were to join our crew, we might have to weaken the artificial gravity for your sake.
It looks like busts of your caliber aren't unique to Mejare, Jura.
Having smaller breasts aids a woman in combat, but perhaps there's something to be said for the way large ones strengthen your back.
...~name~'s breasts might be bigger than yours, Jura. Does that actually inspire any jealousy in you?
...I wonder what it's like for one's breasts to bounce instead of lightly shake about.
...I-is that what men find most attractive? Large, bouncing breasts? Women on Mejare are the same way...
I can't help but associate large breasts with Famahood, given my homeworld's culture. We usually only lactate during and after pregnancy--is that true for Earth women?
...I've often been bigger and taller than other girls. I got that from my Oma. But I also got her bustline, which usually doesn't measure up.
...As if this weren't already humiliating.
...Somehow, those look even bigger now that they're free. And here I thought that was a size reserved for Mejare, a planet designed to grow our breasts.
Those would be such a pain if you were to engage in combat. Bouncing around, being struck, lugging their weight...I feel like I don't give you enough credit for dealing with yours, Jura.
Those...well, they're obviously impressive. What are your measurements? I assume Earth still uses centimeters.
...Nothing about cup measurements is different on Earth, right? You compare the bust and underbust sizes? Not that there's any doubt yours are impressive...
...On second thought, you would give Jura a run for her money.
...Never mind.
They're...very nice.
...Those are very healthy. You could feed your daughters without issue...
...You're certainly getting all your nutrients.
...I haven't lost a hand, and yet I feel like the loser here.
Mmh...those are quite spectacular. There's no shortage of women with full busts on my homeworld.
Those are...very impressive. Is that what men look for in women--large breasts?
...Hm. Do Earth men prefer larger breasts, as Mejarian women do?
...You must be very proud of your chest. I don't know the feeling.
Appreciation for larger breasts is surely universal across cultures...except, perhaps, for Tarak. They'd be afraid of you suffocating them.
If only my top pilot were at this table to compare with you...her breasts are her pride and joy.

...I'm glad that's settled. We even learned something about Buddhists...they don't desire to exhibit themselves. Good news, Jura.
Feel free to tell us more about these "Buddhist desires." They don't include anything as exhibitionist as Jura, clearly.
I shave intentionally, Mulan...Sei is a coincidence. If you're interested in seeing thick blue pubic hair...well, I'm capable.
Mejare promotes shaving, Mulan. But I know my pubic hair is thick...and I don't want that rubbing against my suit.
I have blue pubic hair, Mulan...or at least I know it grows in thick, from when I didn't own a razor.
I spent my teens getting into fights on the streets. Shaving wasn't a priority for me then, Mulan...I assure you, it grows thick.
It's stylish to shave on Mejare, Mulan...and more practical. I've dealt with my pubic hair growing thick, and I didn't care for it.
...I assure you I have blue pubic hair, Mulan. Or at least I could, if I chose to grow it...Mejare doesn't care for that.
I shave intentionally, Mulan...my hair being blue is irrelevant. Mejare's motto is to be sleek and smooth at all costs.
Blue hair has nothing to do with being shaved, Mulan. Nearly every young woman shaves on Mejare...not that that explains Catria.
I don't want pubic hair rubbing against my suit, Mulan...but I could grow it if I wanted to. Mejare promotes shaving regardless.
Catria's reasoning eludes me, Mulan, but I shave my pubic hair...as is the style on Mejare. It grows thick enough to make that a hassle, mind you.
Privacy is not the priority of our ship's showers...or of Mejare in general. So yes, I have.
If you're referring to her lack of pubic hair, I understand that Earth's opinion on the subject is quite divergent from Mejare's...
Clean? Mejarians are fans of cleanliness. And Jura spends quite a bit of her time in the spa...
Yes, I've seen it. And that cleanliness is mostly the handiwork of the spa attendants.
...This game is getting to be too much for me.
Bondage...no thanks.
I hate being tied up...I hate tight spaces.
...Don't you dare.
Tie me up and you'll regret it.
Come anywhere near me with that webbing and the Nirvana will be paying your planet a visit.
It's no big deal. Besides, you two are bringing all the fun by yourselves...
It's a leader's job to not be any fun. Speaking of which...how much of my schedule did I share with Barnette?
Don't worry about it. As a teenager, I had bigger problems than alcohol anyway...like streetfighting.
It's not your fault...I just know how I get. I might start throwing punches after a few drinks...
Now what are you doing? Attacking us for losing?
What are you--why is your hand glowing? What is this?
Are you threatening us now? Should've expected as much.
Are you--w-what's this glowing all about? Strange powers you were hiding?
And after all that, you look perfectly fine. What was the issue with this?
Is there some defect on your body I'm not seeing? What was the point of that flower business?
That was what you were so anxious to cover? You look like a perfectly healthy young girl.
I'm glad you wasted all of our time, only to lose anyway and reveal a body that's perfectly fine.
Nothing mandates a stripping order, that's true...but I thought Earth women were more conservative.
And I get accused of Mejarians dressing too revealingly. This strange purple Earth woman casts her underwear aside.
This...is not what I expected from an Earth woman. I thought Mejarians dressed unusually light...
Tch. So much for the stereotypes of Earth women being more committed to covering themselves.
Hm? Oh, that's right--your "duel." Well, then...can you see yourself piloting a Dread fighter?
...Oh, you're referring to that challenge from earlier. I don't like being nosy...instead, I'd like to know if you're willing to take up piloting.
I don't like nosy people--or being nosy myself. But you seem intelligent...what do you think about becoming a Dread pilot?
I have no interest in your personal secrets. But we're shorthanded, and you seem smart enough to be a pilot. What do you think?
...And what did the women from "Wakfu" do in your videos to earn them this attention?
You've already told me too much. I have a feeling that "Wakfu's" women were given a tentacle in each orifice and spare change for their popularity.

...I imagine "popularity" is the only compensation I'd get for spreading my legs before a tentacle monster. Is that true for "Wakfu"?
...Hm. Was this man a civilian? The men I know are soldiers, and they at least seem to have a sense of duty.

So now you're even more naked than before...well, I support the move. Mejare values cleanliness on the body.
Mejare treats body hair like a plague to be eradicated...so you've given me mixed feelings.
Now you'd fit right in on Mejare. Had you come there looking how you did before, they'd have forcibly shaved you.
On my home planet, women value shaving to an extreme...the goal is to look as sleek as possible. You certainly fit the bill now.
...Do you get a lot of customers? Because this isn't funny.

With the way you're acting, I was expecting your labia to be pitch-black. Of course, some ailments are invisible.

...At least your labia aren't gangrenous. I was fearing the worst, given how many "cocks" you have claim to have stuck inside it.

Regardless, I can't fault the choices of women who take care of themselves. I hope you're both happy together.
...Neglecting to shave is usually an indication a Mejarian is depressed, Saki. Not that I'm aware of Earth's culture.
You haven't trimmed it at all? Young women usually shave on Mejare...it shows they're willing to take care of themselves.
What a tangled mess. I'm not from Earth, but if I had a pilot who didn't take care of herself, I'd be worried about her.
...A lack of self-care shows that a woman is unwell. On Mejare, the metric we often use is whether she shaves.
Shaved...I didn't expect that from a soldier. Not one as sloppy as you, anyway.
Completely shaved...for once, Sei, we agree. I was expecting your pubic hair to be as disgusting as your behavior.
...Well, if nothing else, Sei, we look alike. Blue hair, and completely shaved...much cleaner than I expected of you.
Mejare makes a point of shaving pubic hair...I wasn't aware Earth women did, as well. Especially when you're so undisciplined otherwise.

Even the die is getting sick of this.

state.text: If this doesn't prove the existence of fate, I don't know what does.

case.state: ...You really did have this all planned out.

Not content to flaunt the size of your breasts, you want to make sure everyone gets a full view...

Don't concern yourself with Dita...she doesn't belong in a place like this. Then again, it seems I've taken to it in spite of myself.

Bitch!

Fuck you!

I know I can seem hostile...but you really do look nice. Women always do, where I'm from...

I'm still not sure if you see this female-female nudity as entirely platonic...

I shouldn't keep picturing myself having to join you. It'll become a self-fulfilling prophecy.

condition.saying: Meia, you could learn a lot from Coco. Being direct about things you want helps.

case.state: ...I am direct. You just refuse to believe me when I reject you.
I am direct, Sei. You are unable to take a hint.
...My crewmates have never described me as anything but direct. I think you're the one in denial.
Ask any of my pilots, and they will tell you I am the picture of "directness." You could stand to learn some subtlety.
Mejare has spent countless resources developing its terraforming technology, and you can irrigate land with a melody.
You need to visit Mejare. You could fix its resource management with one symphony.
Mejarian society is dedicated to terraforming what would otherwise be a wasteland...and you can create rain, energy-free.
My homeworld could use a woman with magical powers like yours...so much of our energy goes to climate control.

...Good game, ~name~. I'll be taking my leave of this planet now.
That should be the end of things. Now, if you don't mind, I'll be taking this back.
...Good game. I learned a lot about this planet, and maybe something about myself, as well.
...I guess I can consider this a successful mission to Earth. I learned about your culture and the way men and women live together--and I hope you learned something about Mejare.
...That was a lot of fun. I even learned about my ancestors' world. Now...there it is. The one thing I can't replace.
Mhm. I'll be taking this back, thank you--everything else was standard-issue.
Where is it...there we go. Don't you think I look better with my eyepiece on?
...That's better. Now I don't feel so naked.

scene.directive: Good...you're here.
No one saw you, right?
OK. Come inside.
These are my quarters.
There isn't much to them...just a few personal effects.
Now, keep quiet and listen.
You beat me the other day, so I know you're not stupid.
You've probably guessed why I've summoned you here.
...The lights? I like the dark...so you'd better.
Listen. I went into our game with scientific interest.
But being outplayed...being forced to strip down in front of a man...awoke something inside me.
Something beyond that.
Instinct, I figure...but the point is, I can't stop thinking about it. It's interfering with my work.
I can't have that...so you're going to satisfy my curiosity.
Do you understand?
It's true there are men aboard this ship...
But however I may feel about them...
I'd rather stay professional.
So you'll have to do.
Now, come here.
Don't get the wrong idea...
I just need to clear my head...
I can respect a man who challenges me...
And I trust that an Earth man knows what he's doing.
...Don't gawk. You knew what I looked like naked.
Now take out your thing before I change my mind.
...The way it springs out like that...

OK, so...how do we...start?

It's not too different from how you'd treat a woman...
I can feel the blood rushing through this thing...the way it twitches.
...It's as if it has a mind of its own, straining to reach me.
Oh, I see, the whole hand...
...That must be simulating putting it inside me...
I read a bit about this already.
Is inserting it the next step, or is there something else?
...Suck on it?
You're--just making fun of me...!
I didn't read anything about putting it in my mouth...

Mm...
You must trust me, putting this thing near my teeth...
Or you don't consider me a threat.
Every man on Tarak is praying for you, you know...

Mm...
Mm...nwm...mm...
Mwm...mm...

Mm!
Nwom so wough...!
Mmmhh...

I'd rather not be at the mercy of a man grabbing me by the head.
Here, put it between my breasts...
I heard Jura going on about this technique...
...I'm sure it'd feel better if my breasts were bigger.
Ngh...
This tube of yours can take a lot of abuse.
Even now, I still don't know what to make of it, or of men in general.
At least you've given me the chance to study it before it goes anywhere else...
A-agh!
G-give me a warning before you--fire, or whatever.
All over my face...you are just making fun of me.
...So, this is a man's seed.
It's so warm...
...This isn't how I would have chosen to be introduced to it.
I can't believe this would impregnate me.
If it got inside me, that is...

That's good...

...What do you mean, you can't do it again right away?
Men really are useless...

...Dummy.
Ngh.

I've already made a fool of myself by sucking on that thing, and again for thinking you wouldn't spurt your seed on my face.

On top of being soothing, I've been told breast massages can help them grow.

Ow! H-hey, watch it!
Women's breasts are sensitive! You can't just...manhandle them.

Some time later...
Mmm...that was nice. There's nothing quite like it...
Now for the real thing. I couldn't put this off forever.
Come here and insert your tube...

OK, Earth-man.
It's time to prove to me that bringing you here wasn't a mistake.

Show me what a man can do.
Hah...hah...
Stick it in...
Mm!
Mm...
A man and a woman, together...

T-this is ah certainly a lot--rougher than with a woman.

But I like it.

Do it harder. I can take it...
I want to lose control.
Agh!
Ngh!
Mm!
Give it to me...
M-my body's--going wild!

~name~.

That said, women have more stamina. I wouldn't mind some more...but you look totally drained.

I would appreciate another massage.
The Nirvana...
Far in the future.
There you are.
It's good to see you again...~name~.
Welcome to the Nirvana.
I'm sorry I couldn't invite you to my home...or rather, this is my home.
I hope that uniform is comfortable. It's doing its job...you'll blend in with our lower-ranking guards.
That makes things easier for me...for us.
...You understand, yes? I don't want my crewmates seeing me with strange women...
...There's no need for any rumors.
Don't take it personally. You're a sweet girl...
...One I enjoyed playing poker with, even as I had to strip.
And, of course, you won...I like it when a woman can challenge me.
...Come with me. We'll tour the ship.
We're right by my quarters...there isn't much to them, as you can see.
But I like to sit here and draw up flight schedules... schematics...that sort of thing.
Leading the squadron takes up a lot of my time. You're here with me in a rare moment of freedom.
Let's head out of the living areas...
Oh, hello, Leader!
Leader Meia! How are you?
Good evening, Gasma. And you, Fallopelle.
(S-she knows our names?)
Hush! U-uh, Leader, who's the new girl?

Y-yes, ma'am!
Y-yes, ma'am!

Weight machines, flight simulation consoles...very stimulating.

You saw me naked...am I in good shape?

Yes, I'm aware of the parallels to man-woman sex in "combining" ships.
I think I preferred when I wasn't.
...And this is our energy core, the Paksis Pragma.

It wields a power we don't fully understand...and it seems to feed off of our emotions.
...It seems to be shining brightly today.
Now to pass through the Regisystem, where our weapons are...
Off in a hurry someplace, Meia? Stay a while, play cards.
Oh, Gascogne...I'm sorry, but not tonight. We have a new recruit.
Is that the fresh face hiding behind you?
Normally I'm the one to give tours--you must really like this girl.
...~name~, this is our quartermaster, Gascogne.
I spoke highly of her, as you'll recall.
But we must be on our way.
Charmed by Meia's brand of stoicism, ~name~? You're not alone.
Gascogne--
I'll be off now. Smile, smile!
...I'm sorry about that.
Now, here we are at the final place I wanted to show you...the main one.
This is the Nirvana's hot springs and spa.
I know this is forward of me, but we were both willing to play strip poker...
So...would you like to take a bath with me?
Thank you for this. Is the water nice?
There's been rumors going around the ship about its effects.
More potent hormones, enlarged breasts...probably untrue.
I hope bathing nude isn't too awkward for you. It's how our crew likes it.
Even after that poker match, I wasn't sure how Earth women felt about each other...
...W-well, I suppose there's no point hiding my intentions any further.
I made it perfectly clear during our game that our Mejarians see other women in a sexual light...
And as we stripped down...as I had to masturbate like that...

You're a beautiful woman...
One I could invite to the hot springs without risking my reputation with the crew.
I'd rather keep things professional there.
I'm sorry if you feel deceived. Earth women...are only interested in men, aren't you?
~name~...
I-I never thought... you'd feel this way.
~name~...
Mm...
Oh, God...I'd forgotten what this felt like.
Hah!
Ngh...
Can't let you do all the work...

That wasn't so I could roll over and let you have your way with me.
I hope you're in as good of shape as your figure implies.
Ah...
Nnh...
Y-you--how'd you know my breasts were so sensitive?

D-don't stop. I want to test that enlargement rumor...
Mmgh...
Mmm...
How is this? Let me know what feels good...
Here...
This is as close as two women can get...
Short of one becoming the Fama for another's daughters, of course.
I've been told I'm good with children...
I'm sorry, I just met you. I shouldn't say things like that...
Mm...
Nnm...
You're very healthy...I can tell just from how you taste.

Nnmh...
Well?
How's the water treating you? Do you feel more feminine?
I do...more than I have in a long time.
Ok...now do me.
I want to see what an Earth woman is capable of.
Mmh!

~name~...I'm so glad to have...m-met you...

Ah!
Mgh!
~name~!
Mm!
